examples.name: Natam Natamt
examples.description: Example user with custom ID and image

examples.name: John Doe
examples.description: Example user with Clerk-like ID format

requiredFields.name: String - User's full name (required)
requiredFields.email: String - User's email address (must be unique)
requiredFields.image: String - Profile image URL (optional, defaults to empty string)

autoGeneratedFields.createdAt: DateTime - Automatically set when user is created
autoGeneratedFields.updatedAt: DateTime - Automatically updated on each modification

notes: The 'id' field must be unique - you can use any string format
If using Clerk authentication, use Clerk user IDs (format: 'user_xxxxx')
The 'email' field must be unique across all users
If 'image' is not provided, it defaults to an empty string
Make sure the user email matches any Clerk user if you want them to authenticate
